topics.body: Oh my gods; so I decided to screw around in stalker for a bit and I popped into the game and realized I saved in the worst fucking spot on hardest difficulty.  If I manage to get out of the forest alive with not a single fucking bullet, no medkits and no anti-radiation stuff someone should make a statue out of me on a horse. . no wait, on a motorcycle.

topics.body:
"@Albus Fahrenheits":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546e91ed63687250bfb20000#post_546e91ed63687250bfb20000
We mexicans and filipinos have a nice story together, we shared our sufferings under the spanish rule, and we had to fight for our nations to be born, feeding the, with the blood of the martyrs. Its nice to have you here brother.

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546e931f636872537a8d0200#post_546e931f636872537a8d0200
What if you were on a horse that was itself on a motorcycle?

Seriously though, shit like that is why I love video games, anything that lets you come out with some sort of unexpected story that no one meant to happen is goddamn amazing in my book.

topics.body:
"@Meresflut":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546e9d58636872452a890000#post_546e9d58636872452a890000

Ese fue una opción de lectura para Español en secundaria, yo de wey me fui por el de 'Platero y Yo'.

Es acerca de un psicólogo que un día recibe una carta de uno de sus antiguos pacientes, quién lo culpa de que la terapia que tuvo haya salido mal y amenaza con matar a una persona si no es capaz de descifrar su identidad en un lapso de tiempo. Si te laten ese tipo de historias, te vas a entretener.

"@Meresflut":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546e9da06368721bf1310000#post_546e9da06368721bf1310000

El dios venado os perdona, mortal.

Y regla de vida: Todo puede ser y en algún, sera de maricas
